Annotations.Comment: The component elements which are missing below will instantiate properties from a component class that will result from importing NMDOL and HOC into this language.

It seems like the content below should be nested in some kind of component instance such as Cell. However Cell is already defined once in the context of population. Does this code belong inside the above Cell block?
soma_x soma_y soma_z
dendbl: A contraction of Dendrite Basal Lateral. denda: A contraction of Dendrite Apical.
dendbl_x dendbl_y dendbl_z
denda_x denda_y denda_z
The values of DerivedProperty elements are populated from PropertySendPort s of Component > Distribution s Distribution is the top-level element for distribution component classes and defines all expressions.
